bug.author: mquinteiro
bug.description:
Following the instructions of <denchmark-link:https://autokeras.com/start/>https://autokeras.com/start/</denchmark-link>
I've found this error Loading load_image_dataset with
rise an error " No module named 'autokeras.image_classifier'" checking the script in the rise the error from different module "from autokeras.classifier import load_image_dataset" I've found the function in the module image_supervised.py
